title: How to Draw Cartoon Kissing Fish

steps.headline: Draw an X in the middle of your paper.
Draw the ends of each fish.
steps.description: So each side of the X will look like a diamond.

steps.headline: On the fish on the right, start by adding and eye.
Create the male fish eyebrow by making a thick line over the eye.
Now at the middle of the X, make a big happy smile.
Now add ridges on the back of the male fish.
Now add ridges to the back of the female fish.
Add a U shape for the eye just like we did for the male, onto the female.
Now the Eyebrow.
steps.description: Make her eyebrow a lot thinner.

steps.headline: The smile will be just like the males, be sure you put it right in the middle of the X.
steps.description: And also buff out the lips so it looks like lipstick has been applied.

steps.headline: Add a couple more things like lines at the end of the tail fin.
Color your fish.
steps.description: This is up to you. I did mine Green and Yellow you can do that too. But this is all up to you!

steps.headline: Now add the ocean and some bubbles.
steps.description: That will give it a strong effect on that they're fish!

steps.headline: Lastly, add a heart.
steps.description: You can make it any color. You don't even have to add one! Make it yours by doing whatever you want too!

text: Steps Draw an X in the middle of your paper.  Draw the ends of each fish. So each side of the X will look like a diamond. Draw all the necessary fins. (Tail fin, arm, etc.) On the fish on the right, start by adding and eye. Make it a U shape. Create the male fish eyebrow by making a thick line over the eye.  Now at the middle of the X, make a big happy smile.  Now add ridges on the back of the male fish.  Now add ridges to the back of the female fish.  Add a U shape for the eye just like we did for the male, onto the female.  Add the eyelashes.  Now the Eyebrow. Make her eyebrow a lot thinner. The smile will be just like the males, be sure you put it right in the middle of the X. And also buff out the lips so it looks like lipstick has been applied. Add a couple more things like lines at the end of the tail fin.  Cartoon Affects & Accessories Color your fish. This is up to you. I did mine Green and Yellow you can do that too. But this is all up to you! Now add the ocean and some bubbles. That will give it a strong effect on that they're fish! Lastly, add a heart. You can make it any color. You don't even have to add one! Make it yours by doing whatever you want too!
